response.overview: Mia works the night shift at a remote gas station. A quiet evening – if only her mind weren’t still on the quarrel with her boyfriend Damon. The shift is nearly over, when suddenly he walks in. Damon tries to make amends, until he sees something outside and rushes to the bathroom. Before Mia knows it, she’s face-to-face with a masked figure… holding a gun. A robbery. Or is it? And is Damon really who he pretends to be? A gory, animated graduation film.
response.title: Closing Hour
